directions: Season chicken with vinegar and soy sauce. Add sazon, a generous amount of adobo, garlic powder, oregano and adobo and mix well. (Don't use your hands or they will turn orange) Let chicken marinate at least 20 minutes. Broil or grill on low until chicken is cooked through, careful not to burn. Enjoy with rice and salad.
ingredients: 1 packet Sazon (in Spanish aisle, I prefer Badia brand with no MSG)
title: Broiled or Grilled Pollo Sabroso
